attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement for all animal tested products to show this clearly
attributes.additional_details: There's no clear instruction on any products whether animal testing is used. I know many animal lovers who have been very upset after later finding out that a product they have used for years has caused injury and mistreatment to animals.
attributes.background: Many people care and are affected by the mistreatment of animals for human gain. The difficulty is that it isn't always simple to see which products use animal testing or the affects caused. I believe that this should be clearly shown on all products, like the smoking affects on tobacco products.
